dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Haffner
Y. Bengio
L. Bottou
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 is a dataset consisting of 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 different classes, with 6,000 images per class. It is commonly used for training machine learning algorithms in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Haffner
Y. Bengio
L. Bottou
dcterms:description: CIFAR-100 is a dataset consisting of 60,000 32x32 color images in 100 different classes, with 600 images per class. It is used for more fine-grained image classification tasks compared to CIFAR-10.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
L. Bottou
Y. Bengio
P. Haffner
dcterms:description: MNIST is a dataset of handwritten digits, consisting of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images. It is widely used for training various image processing systems.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: H. Xiao
K. Rasul
R. Vollgraf
dcterms:description: Fashion-MNIST is a dataset of Zalando's article images, consisting of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, designed as a drop-in replacement for the MNIST dataset.
dcterms:title: Fashion-MNIST

dcterms:creator: D. Maltoni
V. Lomonaco
dcterms:description: CORe-50 is a dataset designed for continual learning, consisting of 50 classes with around 2400 examples per class, organized in a way to facilitate incremental learning tasks.
dcterms:title: CORe-50
